INDN 499 Undergraduate Research (3-5, max. 15)
Primarily for South Asian language and literature majors. Offered: AWSpS.
View course details in MyPlan: INDN 499

INDN 410 Prakrit (3, max. 6) VLPA
Introduction to the various Prakrit or Middle Indo-Aryan dialects (Gandhari, Magadhi, Maharashtri, Sauraseni) from literary, canonical, and inscriptional sources.

INDN 401 Pali (3) VLPA
Introduction to Pali language and literature.

INDN 402 Pali (3) VLPA Cox, Salomon
Introduction to Pali language and literature.
View course details in MyPlan: INDN 402

INDN 490 Senior Seminar (5)
Seminar study of special topics in the languages and literatures of South Asia.
View course details in MyPlan: INDN 490
